content.original: Bruneian people are friendly but they prefer to keep to themselves. But do please ask around and they are more likely to provide assistants.
content.translated: 文莱人很友好，但他们更喜欢独处。 但请四处询问，他们更倾向于提供助手。

translationButton.translatedDisclaimer: Translated By ModernMT 以下描述已从原语言翻译成您的语言，但并不能保证翻译完全准确。

content.original: 3 Bedroom apartment in the middle of Bandar Seri Begawan with two washrooms, a balcony and a fully size kitchen. Close to St. Adrews School and within easy walking reach to various parks and eateries. Secure area with gate and CCTV. Ready to move in. Experience Bandar Seri Begawan up close.
content.translated: 3卧室公寓，位于Bandar Seri Begawan市中心，配有2间卫生间、1个阳台和宽敞的厨房。 靠近圣阿德鲁斯学校，步行即可轻松抵达各类公园和餐厅。 配有大门和闭路电视的安全区域。 可供随时入住。近距离体验斯里贝加湾（ Seri Begawan ）乐园。

content.original: Brunei and Bandar Seri Bagawan in particular is one of those places where daily life is devoid of fast pace speed that is a norm in other capitals even just outside of its border. It is a place where to truly enjoy what it can offer, one needs to just walk around the capital from its majestic Masjid Omar Ali Saifuddien mosque, to the curious Dang Ayang Mausoleum and State Library Mural in between. The field in between all these is the field where Brunei declared its full independence from British Protectorate in 1984. Remnant of the old colonial power can be seen from the field in the Old Secretariat building. Just barely five minutes away, Lapau Diraja or the Royal Court can be seen where the current monarch His Majesty Sultan Haji Hassanal Bolkiah was coronated in the full traditional glory that can be learnt more from the close-by Royal Regalia Museum. There are more of these that can be seen in Bandar Seri Begawan and the apartment is very close to all of them. Just ask any locals you meet who all can speak English fluently and they are more than happy to answer your queries. Its a kingdom of unexpected treasures if you are willing to slow down and enjoy what it can offer.
content.translated: 文莱达鲁萨兰国和斯里巴加万邦是日常生活没有快节奏的地方之一，而这在其他首都甚至在边境之外也是一种常态。 您可以在这里真正享受这里提供的一切，只需从其宏伟的Masjid Omar Ali Saifuddien清真寺到奇妙的当阿阳陵和国家图书馆壁画之间漫步即可。 在所有这些领域之间，文莱达鲁萨兰国于1984年宣布完全独立于英国保护国。 从旧秘书处大楼的实地可以看到旧殖民国家的残余。 距离拉保·迪拉贾（ Lapau Diraja ）或皇家法院仅5分钟路程，可以看到现任君主苏丹·哈吉·哈桑纳尔·博尔基亚陛下在完全传统的荣耀中加冕，可以从附近的皇家礼拜博物馆了解更多。 在斯里贝加万银行（ Bandar Seri Begawan ）可以看到更多这些景点，公寓离所有景点都非常近。 只需询问您遇到的任何会流利讲英语的当地人，他们非常乐意解答您的问题。 如果您愿意放慢脚步，尽情享受它能提供的一切，这里就是一个意想不到的宝藏王国。

content.original: The flat where the apartment is located is in a safe neighbourhood near to a local high school. The area is secured by CCTV and the gate will automatically closed after a set time.
content.translated: 公寓所在的公寓位于靠近当地高中的安全街区。 该区域设有监视摄像头，大门将在设定时间后自动关闭。

items.title: 斯里巴加湾（Bandar Seri Begawan），文莱摩拉县(Brunei-Muara District)，文莱

content.original: You can find public transport station within the town but it is better to rent a car either via your travel agent or at the airport. Don't miss a ride on water taxis if you wish to have a chance to spot proboscis monkey or travel around Kampong Air (Water Village)
content.translated: 您可以在市内找到公共交通站，但最好通过旅行社或在机场租车。 如果您想探索Prooscis猴子或在Kampong Air （水上村）四处旅行，请不要错过水上出租车
